text: Jilani: “Naŵaga achatati ŵenu, ŵanache ŵenu, achachimwene ŵenu, achiŵammakwenu, achanasi ŵenu, kwisa soni ipanje yanyyipatile, ni malonda gankugajogopela konasika, kwisa soni majumba gankuganonyela, (naiŵaga yalakweyi) yakunonyeledwa nnope kukwenu kumpunda Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ ni kumenyana ngondo petala Lyakwe; basi jembecheyani kwikanila Allah ayiche ni chilamusi Chakwe (cha ipotesi), soni Allah ngaakwajongolaga ŵandu ŵakunyosya.”
